ygData.subject: Re: Magical Weapon
ygData.msgSnippet: Little correction : I bought a tentacle whip myself and I think it s 4 damage, 25 delay, with the lifetap effect. Thormael
ygData.messageBody:
Little correction : I bought a tentacle whip myself and I think it's 4
damage, 25 delay, with the lifetap effect.

Thormael

>From: Kevin Koen <big_k69@...>
>
>as for the tentacle whip it is a 5dmg 28 del plus lifetap
>the bloodclaw i believe is 5dmg 23-25del
>the Barded (which i am dual wielding) are 7dmg and 28del...i am level 28
>and
>i hit for 20 with them...my strength is 106 with items and 140
>with str buff and anthem de arms from a group mate
>
>the whips u can get from najena both tentacle and barbed
>
>Hope this helps
>
>Genadarilo of Povar
>Hail The Hawk Empire
